Program Title: SunWatts Renewable Energy and Rebate Program
Program Description: Rebate of 5 cents per watt ($50 per kW), up to $2500, for residential photovolatic and wind systems
Rebate Value: Incentives are 5 cents per watt ($50 per kW), up to a maximum system size of 50 kW. The incentive cap is $2,500
Other Restrictions: Leased systems are not eligible for incentives
